meanings.definition: A carbohydrate composed of three monosaccharide units.
meanings.sent1: A trisaccharide is a sweet substance made up of three sugar parts.
meanings.sent2: The trisaccharide in the drink provided quick energy to the athlete.
meanings.sent3: The trisaccharide and its two friends walked into the bakery for a snack.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a trisaccharide on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The trisaccharide sparkled like a crystal in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A type of sugar consisting of three simple sugars linked together.
meanings.sent1: The trisaccharide was a blend of three different sugars.
meanings.sent2: She avoided foods high in trisaccharides to maintain a balanced diet.
meanings.sent3: The trisaccharide trio danced together in the sugary solution.
meanings.sent4: His words were as sweet as a trisaccharide, bringing comfort to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The trisaccharide shone brightly in the sea of simple sugars.
